extendedInfo.description: Lightning reverberated in the sky, Thunder Dragon shine gold light.Brilliant flash of light work miracle and change fate!Dinosaur Live WallpaperTwo animations to enjoy!Change other animation by scrolling.Replay and pause by tap.*To use:Menu>Wallpapers>LiveWallpapers->Dragon Thunder Free*Portrait only.*This wallpaper is trial version for one day.The animation does not play after one day.However, if you reinstall, you can use again.Full versionhttps://market.android.com/details?id=com.dmf.wall.DragonThunder*The scrolling depends behavior of Home application.If scrolling does not work or something strange, try to check Home app's settings.(scrolling speed, overshoot, etc.)*Please resetting if the screen turn black when updating it with setting the wallpaper.

reviews.title: Finally!!!
reviews.comment: Been looking for a free wallpaper worth installing (and leavng installed ) this is one of the first...keep up the good work PLEASE!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: SUPER!!!
reviews.comment: Very nice winged, gold dragon! The 2nd one you guys have made with wings! Beautiful &I love it! The fire the 2nd one breathes looks real. I bought it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Slow...
reviews.comment: This background worked great until I got a notification that it \"expired\" (what?) Now its all slow and blurry and won\'t work half the time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Five stars
reviews.comment: Awesome,the best live wallpaper out there. Great detail,right down to the sunbeams. Incredible
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I love it
reviews.comment: I really like both dragons.Keep up the good work.
reviews.author: jacky shawn

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Dragons should be free no payment should have to be done
reviews.author: Thomas Maher

reviews.title: Dragon thunder
reviews.comment: Im a sucker for winged dragons 5 stars! :-)
reviews.author: A Google User
